conveyance.translation[0].definitions[0]: Wheeled conveyances of any kind are not allowed in the park.
conveyance.translation[0].definitions[1]: when you take something from one place to another
conveyance.translation[0].definitions[2]: when you communicate or express something, with or without words
Facial expressions are part of the conveyance of meaning.
conveyance.translation[0].definitions[3]: a legal document that gives land, property etc to one person from another
conveyance.translation[1].definitions[0]: a document that officially states that land or property has passed from one person to another
the drafting of a legal document such as a will or a conveyance
conveyance.translation[1].definitions[1]: when land or property that was owned by one person becomes the property of another person, or the legal process involved in doing this
the conveyance of a legal estate to new trustees
